forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind around 25 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind 18 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

weather_report:
The atmosphere in Downtown San Francisco is embracing clarity this afternoon, infused with the gentle embrace of sunlight and the invigorating touch of the west wind. As the warmth of the day peaks, the temperature hovers comfortably, a brief flirtation with the season’s beauty before retreating slightly as the afternoon unfolds. While the horizon remains clear and inviting, one can observe hints of the iconic fog gently caressing the edges of the coastline, a reminder of the city's playful pull between sunshine and mist.

Tonight, the transition continues as the sky turns partially cloudy, offering a serene backdrop for evening strollers or those seeking quiet moments in local parks. A light jacket or layered attire will serve well against the chilly caress of the wind as it carries the whispers of the bay. With daylight dwindling, this is a splendid time to explore the neighborhood's cozy cafés or enjoy a stroll along the waterfront, taking in the captivating dance of lights reflecting on the bay. Engaging in simple pleasures under this magnificent sky feels just right as San Francisco continues to showcase its enchanting blend of urban adventure and natural beauty.
